name: Guess The Number (CatoGato)
description:
"Guess the number" Game

The game will randomize a number between 1 to 30 and your goal is to guess what number the computer chose :)

Dont worry! The game will lead you to the win! If you have guessed a number which is too low, The game will tell you that you should try a higher number, and vice versa!

The game includes a main menu so you can change the volume, play agein or exit the game.

I am 14, This is the first game i created using c# and unity, And I hope you will like it!

See you later,

David
